name: Twilight Crusade
storyline: You take Baron back to your home to help him recover from your wounds, but you realize that there's something different about him... He has the fangs of a vampire! Without knowing it you've involved yourself in the war for survival between humans and vampires...
summary:
In a world where vampires and humans are at war, will you be able to find true love?

A visual romance novel about a war between vampires and humans! Make choices and try to survive all this chaos and, in the midst of it all, get to know the three guys who are by your side better.
